Name: Alien Defense
About the game: This game is a build-type defense game. Raise an army and kill the invading aliens to acquire resources Various upgrades and more powerful units can be produced Twelve Heroes Appeared! Heroes have special abilities, equip items and level up to protect your base from aliens The more you kill the aliens, the stronger the aliens will come and you can get more resources. Let's go now to the world of the endlessly flocking aliens! Item level : There are Normal, Advanced, Rare, Legend levels. Strengthen Items : All items have a 60% chance if you can do 5 enhancements, and will disappear if the enhancement fails. Unit Transcendence : Combine multiple units to transcend into a stronger unit
